SerializableChapterContents.Text: Angela is sitting on the train, commuting to work, when suddenly the world freezes... Not in the sense of getting cold, but in the sense that the train's movement is completely halted from one instant to the next. At the same time, every passenger in the train becomes inanimate. It's as if someone clicked the pause button, but the world forgot to include Angela in the pause command.

LineParts.PartText: I'm dreaming!
Wait... I said that out loud, didn't I?
And I'm allowed to say things out loud because it's my dream!
I like this... Maybe I should begin thinking out loud more often
Alright, so this is my morning commute, I recognize that
And, I can see from the progress bars, that we are 5 minutes off Thousand Acre Forest (East), so I have a pretty good idea of the 'where' of this dream

SerializableChapterContents.Text: Angela takes out her cell phone and checks the date on the display: Wednesday - April 10th - 2024.

LineParts.PartText: That's today, isn't it?
OK, so the 'when' is today...or yesterday... How the hell do I determine the time OUTSIDE my dream
Who cares?
OK... I kinda thought this was my show, but alright...
So... Here we are, in a situation I have recently experienced, and you have brought me here...
You've brought me here because I missed something, right?

Because that's what dreams are about... The brain does a complete garbage collection and cleans out any interrupted and/or unfinished thoughts, and at this point of my day, I left something interrupted
Am I right?
Look Brain, I don't negotiate with terrorists... Either you're in the dream, and you ping/pong with me and you get to have your little passive/aggressive outbursts, or you're out and you stay out
Alright, just remember that you asked for it...
DOES A TREE MAKE A SOUND IF IT FALLS IN THE FOREST AND NO ONE IS AROUND TO HEAR IT?
AND WHAT IF IT DOESN'T SO MUCH FALL AS GENTLY LAND ON ITS BUTT?
DO TREES EVEN HAVE BUTTS? I KNOW THEY HAVE BUDS, BUT DO THEY HAVE BUTTS?
AND WHAT IF THERE IS INDEED SOMEONE AROUND TO HEAR IT, BUT THE PERSON IS DEAF AND...
Oh my God, what the hell is wrong with you?
Well, if Doctor Petersson couldn't figure that out over the course of 5 years, do you think we're going to figure it out during this dream?
What do you want from me?
A simple answer would be nice: Have you brought me here to figure out what I missed?
YES!
Good! Now, are you in or are you out?
I'm OUT! Goodbye
Good riddance! I can't stand people - or brains - who think they can have it both ways
Have your cake and eat it too...
Now, that gives me an idea...
I will close my eyes, and think about a chocolate cake with chocolate frosting...
It worked! But look at that thing, not even in my dreams could I win a baking show, huh?
But... who cares? This is about the science of it...
TONIGHT LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, WE WILL ANSWER THE AGE-OLD QUESTION:
'IF YOU EAT AN ENTIRE CHOCOLATE CAKE IN YOUR DREAMS, WILL YOU WAKE UP AND BE FAT?'
AND... TO HELP US ANSWER THAT QUESTION, HERE IS THE LOVELY AAAAANGEEELLAAAAAA
AND NOW... IF THE AUDIENCE WOULD PLEASE SHUT THE FUCK UP AS LOVELY ANGELA ATTEMPTS TO CRAM DOWN THIS WHOLE CAKE IN ONE GO...
Drum-roll please...

LineParts.Description: practically shoving cake down her throat

LineParts.PartText: AND THERE YOU HAVE IT LADIES AND GENTLEMEN, SHE'S DONE IT! LET'S HEAR FROM THE LOVELY ANGELA HOW SHE'S DOING
ANGELA! HOW DO YOU FEEL RIGHT NOW?
Well Mike, I feel like I have just swallowed an entire chocolate cake...
And I don't even like cake... boo hoo for me...
I think I'm going to be sick!
ISN'T SHE JUST A TREAT LADES AND GENTLEMEN?!
WELL, THAT'S IT FOR TONIGHT, BE SURE TO CHECK IN AGAIN WHEN WE WAKE UP, TO DISCOVER IF 'LOVELY ANGELA' IS NOW 'FAT ANGELA'. UNTIL NEXT TIME!
Alright, with that out of the way, let's see what we have here
I remember that guy, but why?
Do I feel attracted to him?
No... He's certainly not the type of guy I would usually go for
But this is definitely about him
There was something about what he was doing... and what he was doing was...?
He was watching that guy over there
Uff! That guy looks like a complete sleazebag. Yuck!
He's got like a sex-offender vibe to him
I don't want him in my dream
EXCUSE ME, CREEP
Who me?
How many other creeps do you see in this dream?
There's at least...
That's enough FILTH out of your FILTHY mouth! Go stand in the other end of the train where I can't see you
Or what?
Ooooh... magic time again
Now, we say 'abracadabra', and look what started crawling on your arms... Bull ants!
Eeeew... That's disgusting!
Oh yes... very, but wait until you feel their bite!
AAAAAAAAARRRRRGHHHH! THAT HURTS SO BAD!
Yes... That's what I have heard. Now go stand in the other end of the train, and if you leave now, I'll make sure someone is waiting for you with a strong painkiller to take the top off
ARRRRGGGGGGHHH
LineParts.Description: running out of the train car

LineParts.PartText: No rest for the wicked! The guy will be waiting for you with a nice shot of FENTANYL... Let's hope you get the dose right... Muahaha
Alright... Back to the guy. He was watching the creep, but why?
What do you say we cheat a little Angela...?
Oh my, that's a splendid idea! Seeing as this is my dream, and I'm supreme ruler
- queen of the bull ants -
I could step a little closer and have a better look at the guy
Hmmm... Those are sinister eyes. Pretty color of blue, but they cover some nasty secrets, don't they? Intriguing!
Now... You were watching the creep. You weren't in love with the creep, and you don't look like you are about to burst out in a birthday tune for the loser, so why were you watching him?
Let me think...
Back in the real world...
The boring world...
The place where I cannot command bull ants... YET (!)
... you got off at the same stop as he did... because you were following him, but wait a minute...
You went for the exit before he did! Which means that you must have known where he was going, and when you got off the train...
...you were going to follow him and... kill him!
That's it, isn't it?! You were following him, and you were following him in order to kill him, and the reason you wanted to kill the creep was... that he's a creep!
... or that is at least what you tell yourself, but maybe that's just an excuse...
...because you are a very angry man!
And so you track down and kill creeps as an outlet for your anger!
Am I right?!
You are right, but I'd like to think I'm also doing some good in the world
Holy shit! You talk!
How long have you been here?
Well, the whole time
Yeah, but like, there's a lot of people here, but they're not really here...
Like, I could draw a whiskers on them and they wouldn't object...
How long have you been... sentient?
It's kinda hard for me to say, but I think the whole time
I was there for the terrorist negotiation with Brain
Oh no... Then you also saw the cake-eating contest?
Yes, I found that bit especially...
embarrassing?
charming
Ooooh... I like you!
And forget all the stuff I said about me not being attracted to you
- I'm not saying I am or anything -
but I was just checking to see if you were awake that's all
Hey, this is your show... Feel free to change my looks in whatever way you want
Hmm... I think we'll stick with it for now...
Your look does have kind of a rough quality to it
It's probably just an acquired taste
Have it your way
Alright... So I feel like I have solved the first riddle, but I bet there's more...
Am I supposed to guess the details of what that creep has done?
Oh God no! I've read his file and it's not something I want to be reminded of
No, for now, you can relax
I have something I need to show you
LineParts.Description: gets up and reaches into his pocket

LineParts.PartText: Ooooh... Is this gonna be one of those dreams where I'm going to need a long hot shower when I wake up?
That wasn't the plan... Do you want it to be?
Hmmmm
Alright... No Mike, let's see what great mystery hides behind door number 1
But, before we continue, I need to give you a name...
It feels weird thinking of you as 'angry man'
Can I be Fernando Sanchez? I like that name
No... That you cannot
Because Fernando Sanchez is a silly name, which anybody who's anybody knows...
We'll call you John!
John will do
Great... Now, let's see what you have there John

LineParts.Description: pulls out a cell phone and sits down beside her

LineParts.PartText: Can I hold it?
It's sort of a thing for me...
I like being in control...
I know... I'm working on it with Doctor Petersson
I don't mind
You need a new phone!
Alright, no time to waste on that now, but let me at least fix the cracks in the screen like...so
Do you want popcorn?
Sure, I could go for popcorn
Abracadabra: POPCORN!
And... We'll hit 'play' like so...

SerializableChapterContents.Text: The cell phone starts playing a movie. The camera fades in on a young man and a young woman sitting in the clearing by a forest lake on a bright Summer's day.

LineParts.PartText: Ooooh... Is that us?
Not exactly, but then again...
Alright... Do you want to be the boy or the girl?
I'd prefer to be the young man
Hmmm... Alright... A little boring I suppose...
But 'you shouldn't ask a question if you're not willing to accept the answer'
Ooooh... look... I'm pretty ain't I?
I think so
You are kinda handsome too!
On behalf of the young man: thank you
The dialogue is about to start
Point taken
They want me to marry him
Do YOU want to marry him?
No! I want to marry you
I also want to marry you
I don't think it's right that they get to decide
It isn't
Is there anything we can do?
I think so, but we will have the whole world against us
Well, if the world is going to go against us for not getting in line with such a stupid demand, then let the world burn
I love you, and I think I am always going to love you
I love you more than life itself
Will you make love to me?
I will
The screenplay feels a little cheesy doesn't it?
Yeah, but it's supposed to take place in another day and age...
but even so, I'd have to agree with you that it could use a little...
spunk
Yes... spunk
Ooooh, look at them going at it...
This isn't PG-13 huh?
You have the phone... You can press fast forward
No way! Look at that!
Look how clumsy they are!
I think it's their first time... And this is supposed to be way before porn was a thing
Yeah, but this is like the Viking age, isn't it?
Didn't they have like massive sex orgies and such?
I honestly don't know
Ooooh... I just got to thinking...
This was before plumbing and regular showers were a thing...
I know what you're driving at...
Let's be grateful for modern-day hygiene
Amen! Alright... I'm just going to fast forward a bit...
Now what do we have here...
Ooooh... there's our young couple again
They look mean! They are up to no good!
Oh... I think I know what's going to happen here...
I'm not sure I want to watch it
Alright... Let me at least turn the sound off
Oh, that's horrible! Those people don't stand a chance!
NO! If you touch that child, I'm not going to watch any more of this!
They don't touch the children. There are a couple of the grown-ups that get spared as well
That's good!
How many do they kill?
They sliced the throat of 38 people of the village that night, 35 of which died
Because they wanted her to marry someone else?
They were kind of insistent. Those were different times, and she was just a property... He was as well
So, he couldn't just buy her free and work off the debt in the kitchen, huh?
I'm afraid not
But I bet you didn't come here to show me just that... There's more isn't there
Yes
Because the world is not going to just sit back and let them get away with happiness, is it?
And 35 murders + 3 accounts of attempted murder in the first degree, but no, it isn't
And you want me to watch it, right?
I'm afraid that's best
Will you hold me while we watch?
I'd love to
NO NO NO NO YOU DUMB BITCH! DON'T GO IN THERE!
WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOUR DUMB BRAIN?
THERE'S ENOUGH SPEARS FOR AN ENTIRE ARMY LEANED AGAINST THE WALL OUTSIDE, AND YOU ARE WILLING TO BELIEVE THERE'S JUST A SINGLE FAMILY IN THERE!!!?!
I almost don't feel sorry for you when you are that STUPID!
Please tell me that the man has a little brains
Yes... that's good... That's right Mr. Big Brain, it IS a trap...
Yes, just watch them and figure out a plan... Maybe you should jack the spears, eh?
NO! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!
YOU ALREADY KNEW THEY HAD HER! JESUS CHRIST!
ALL YOU HAD GOING FOR YOU WAS THE ELEMENT OF SURPRISE AND NOW YOU DON'T EVEN HAVE THAT...
ALL BECAUSE THEY WAVED A LITTLE KNIFE AGAINST YOUR GIRLFRIENDS THROAT!
Oh no... Please tell me they aren't going to use that for what I think they are going to use it for!
I can't
Jeeesus! WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH MEN???!
I know! But look, it's not just the men
Aw hell! I take back what I said about the slaughter in the village!
They should have killed ALL OF THEM!
Well, not the children... even though they're probably going to grow up to be the same kind of bastards!
Without surviving adults, the children would have been as good as dead come Winter
Thank you Mr. Sinister Realism! Let's do a RomCom next time... I want to see how you handle that!
Wait a minute! What was that?! In the shadows
Let me just pause it... and enlarge...
That looks kind of like a man, doesn't it? A really evil man
Is that a man?
The jury is still out on that one... some call him the Shadow-Man and think of him as kind of an orchestrator of these kinds of rituals, some say there isn't anything at all
Well, I'm on Team Shadow-Man! There totally IS a very evil man right there
Alright, let me just hit 'play' again
Oh, I forgot what this was
How long does this crap go on?
For about an hour
Seriously?! What the hell is wrong with people?!
Do I have to watch the whole thing?
No... The highlights are enough

There is a small part of about 5 seconds right before she dies where she looks longingly at the guy with sort of a 'I'll-see-you-on-the-other-side'-look that is really memorable, but I wouldn't advice on watching the entire thing just for that
Alright
LineParts.Description: handing the cell phone back, and moving to a seat across from John

LineParts.PartText: So. Why did I have to see that?
To get an understanding of what's at stake
Cryptic... But I hadn't expected much more to be honest
Is the Shadow-Man real?
I don't know
I have a feeling I'm barking up the wrong tree here...
There is a riddle in this dream... right here... for me. Right?
I don't know
That's right... you are completely oblivious. I mean, not you as you're sitting right here in front of me... But as it played out on the train...
You were sitting on the train... Closing in on the prey... And your entire focus was on that!
And it wasn't supposed to be
You were supposed to notice me!
I'm not sure there is any 'supposed' here... that would imply predetermination
Potato, potahrto... But I get it...
Something else could have happened here...
And under almost any other circumstance, it would have, but you were too focused on that creep to play the part right
UGH! I'm going to BURN that creep!

SerializableChapterContents.Text: Angela closes her eyes and looks concentrated, and then a loud scream is heard from the other end of the train.

LineParts.PartText: John! Where are you going? John!

SerializableChapterContents.Text:
The entirety of Angela's dream world dissolves into nothing, and Angela is gripped by the feeling of falling through endless darkness.
Angela wakes up in shock! As it turns out, she does have to take a shower because she is drenched in sweat. 
But she is not fat.

Video.AttributionText: Floating Clouds Stock Videos by Vecteezy
